quoteText: <u>To the extent permitted by law, our total liability to you (whether for breach of this contract, negligence or for any other reason whatever) for any loss, harm or damage suffered by you in connection with your downloading, use and/or access of the Riot Services is limited to the total amounts paid by you to Riot during the six (6) months immediately prior to the time your cause of action first arose.</u>
title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

tosdr.case: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
